column5: Hey Everyone,  I don't usually post things like this but... A good friend of mine won the Meguiar's Car Crazy award at the MegaSpeed Car Show this year. It entered him in The Canada's Best Competition to win a trip to Las Vegas to have his truck in the SEMA show.  The pictures don't do it justice, there is about 100k into this truck. A lot of parts were hand made.  PLEASE vote for it!!! HERE          To keep it a little fishing related. His shop is a sponsor for the Fish-A-Thon
He's got my vote Dan, I love those old classics !!
Does he lend it out? I've got a load of old leaky transmissions and engine blocks I want to take to the scrap dealer.    Wow - what a beauty. I can vote.
hahaha, I'm not even allowed to touch it   Thanks guys!
so we  get a free ride in the beast down Long point dr on a hot long weekend Saturday if we vote, right? got my ticket
Hit the vote for this car button but it flipped me to the register page. Didn't register , but did vote for the nice!!!! truck.  Bill
Just a little bump. It's in the top 6, please vote if you haven't already
Sharp looking truck. Looks fast and agressive even standing still. I do custom airbrushing, and I wouldn't add anything to that, even if he wanted to. Perfect as is....
This truck got my vote. Excellent work!
I Just want to thank everyone for voting, the winner was chosen today...  Jim WON!!!
For some reason I couldn't vote, but congrats!
